monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 01
monster.skill: Acrobatics +4, Performance +4, Persuasion +4, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 07
monster.skill: Acrobatics +9, Performance +5, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +6, Stealth +9
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 18
monster.skill: Acrobatics +17, Performance +10, Persuasion +10, Sleight of Hand +11, Stealth +17
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Elusive
trait.text: The expert is so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against them. No attack roll has advantage against them while they aren't incapacitated.

trait.name: Blindsense
trait.text: If the expert is able to hear, the expert is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of them.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 19
monster.skill: Acrobatics +17, Performance +11, Persuasion +11, Sleight of Hand +11, Stealth +17
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Elusive
trait.text: The expert is so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against them. No attack roll has advantage against them while they aren't incapacitated.

trait.name: Blindsense
trait.text: If the expert is able to hear, the expert is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of them.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 20
monster.skill: Acrobatics +17, Performance +11, Persuasion +11, Sleight of Hand +11, Stealth +17
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: The expert has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If their attack misses a target within range, they can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if they fail an ability check, they can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
The expert can use this ability once per day.

trait.name: Elusive
trait.text: The expert is so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against them. No attack roll has advantage against them while they aren't incapacitated.

trait.name: Blindsense
trait.text: If the expert is able to hear, the expert is aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature within 10 feet of them.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.
